en: Oh sing unto Jehovah a new song: Sing unto Jehovah, all the earth.
hmr: Aw LALPA chawimawiin hla thar sak unla. Leihnuoia um po pohai, LALPA chawimawiin hla sak ro.

en: Sing unto Jehovah, bless his name; Show forth his salvation from day to day.
hmr: LALPA chawimawia hla sakin, a hming inpâk unla, Ni tin a sandamna thu chu inhriettir ro.

en: Declare his glory among the nations, His marvellous works among all the peoples.
hmr: Hnam tin lai chun a ropuizie hril unla, Mi tinrênghai lai chun a thilmak thawhai hril ro.

en: For great is Jehovah, and greatly to be praised: He is to be feared above all gods.
hmr: LALPA chu a ropui a, nasataka inpâk ding a ni sih a, Pathien po po nêka ṭî ding a nih.

en: For all the gods of the peoples are idols; But Jehovah made the heavens.
hmr: Mipuihai pathienhai chu milimhai an ni sih a, LALPA ruok chun vânhai khi a siem a nih.

en: Honor and majesty are before him: Strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
hmr: Chawimawina le ropuina a hmaah an um a, Hrâtna le mawina chu a hmun inthiengah an um.

en: Ascribe unto Jehovah, ye kindreds of the peoples, Ascribe unto Jehovah glory and strength.
hmr: Mi tina chi tinrênghai, LALPA kuomah pe unla, LALPA kuoma chun ropuina le hrâtna pe ro.

en: Ascribe unto Jehovah the glory due unto his name: Bring an offering, and come into his courts.
hmr: LALPA kuomah a hming ropuina chu pe unla, Thil inhlân ding chawiin a biekin inhuonna sûng tuollaia chun hung ro.

en: Oh worship Jehovah in holy array: Tremble before him, all the earth.
hmr: Aw, inthieng mawina inbelin LALPA chu chibai bûk unla, Leihnuoia um po pohai, a hmaa chun inthin ro.

en: Say among the nations, Jehovah reigneth: The world also is established that it cannot be moved: He will judge the peoples with equity.
hmr: Hnam tin lai chun, “LALPA chu lalah a ṭhung a,” ti ro, Khawvêl khawm hi ân hnîng thei nawna dingin sukdetin a um a; Ama chun thlierbîk nei loin mi tin ro chu rêl a tih.

en: Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice; Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof;
hmr: Vânhai khi lâwmtakin um sienla, hnuoi khawm hi hlimtakin um raw se, Tuisuoriet le a sûnga um po po hi inri hum hum sienla,

en: Let the field exult, and all that is therein; Then shall all the trees of the wood sing for joy
hmr: Lo le a sûnga um po po hi lâwmtakin um raw se, Chu pha chun ram hnuoia thing po po hi hlimin hla sak an tih.

en: Before Jehovah; for he cometh, For he cometh to judge the earth: He will judge the world with righteousness, And the peoples with his truth.
hmr: LALPA hmaa chun ama chu a hung ding a nih, Hnuoi ro rêl dingin a hung ding a ni sih a. Khawvêl hi feltakin ro rêlpêk a ta, Mi tinhai chu a thutakin ro rêlpêk bawk a tih.
